name: Frog Jump
description: An endless platformer mobile game where a frog charges a jump to accurately land on a platform and collect fireflies while its direction is based on the tilt of the mobile device.

name: Arcade Games
description: A curated collection of engaging 3D web games, powered by Three.js and designed to showcase interactive gaming experiences in the browser.

name: Identifying Common Pest and Disease of Lettuce Plants Using Convolutional Neural Network
description: A published research paper about using a Convolutional Neural Network Model to identify if a lettuce plant is healthy, diseased, or has sign of pest infestation.

name: Portfolio Website
description: It is an application that will help track the users of their tasks and habits, and help improve on them.

name: VHire: Booking System
description: It is a web-based application that provides a facility to reserve, cancel, and search for V-hire transportation seats.

name: Chat App
description: A simple mobile-based chat application built with Xamarin.Forms and Firebase.

name: Hotel Booking
description: An online reservation system that allows potential guests to book a hotel according to their specifications.

name: Inventory System
description: A java application that provides a way to tracks items and control stock before it is sold.

name: Bus Seat Reservation
description: A web application that provides a facility to reserve, cancel, and search for Bus seats.

name: AutoBar
description: It is a mobile-based application built using Xamarin.Forms and MySQL. It is an integration of a POS, E-wallet, and points and rewards system.

name: To Do App
description: A web application that will help users track their tasks and create task with just a click of a button

name: Food Shop
description: A static website with a search filter that shows an example of food ecommerce website.

name: CustomKybrd
description: A static website that shows an example of an keyboard ecommerce website.

name: BasketBall Counter
description: A simple java application that provides the ability to track the scores, fouls, period, time, and shot clock of a basketball game.
